summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF export layout fixes. All critical PDF export functionality working perfectly - two-column grid layout maintained with proper 4fr:8fr ratio, profile image maintains 1:1 aspect ratio (120x120px), PDF downloads triggered successfully, no console errors, all 9 CV sections visible in both normal and PDF modes, language toggle working correctly.
passed_tests: Frontend loads correctly - normal view not affected by PDF fixes (9/9 CV sections visible)
PDF Export button triggers without errors - successfully downloads 'Mediha_Dubravic_CV_Europass_HR.pdf'
Two-column grid layout maintained when pdf-exporting class applied (4fr:8fr ratio = 618.656px:1237.34px)
Profile image maintains perfect 1:1 aspect ratio in PDF mode (120x120px with min/max constraints)
Language toggle works correctly - switches between HR/EN content
All CV sections visible in both normal and PDF export modes (Header, Hero, Contact, Personal Info, Skills, Languages, About, Experience, Education)
Zero console errors during all PDF export operations
html2canvas windowWidth correctly set to 1100px for proper PDF capture
CSS pdf-exporting class working with all layout fixes (grid-template-columns, image constraints)
Profile image uses object-fit: cover for proper aspect ratio maintenance

success_percentage.pdf_export: 100% (layout fixes successful, downloads working, no errors)
